name: Talisolvanar "Tally" Fellbranch

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: Tally has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Club
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

description:
A male half-elf carpenter and woodcarver.
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 32
